ISSUE.TITLE: [bitbucket] Tag builds not executing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Expected behaviour Tag builds triggered on pushing tags to remote # Actual behaviour Need to push the tag twice for it to be picked up. 1. create tag and push it to remote 2. delete tag on local and remote 3. create and push it again -- build triggers # Version latest

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [PIPE-22071]: Enhance pipeline list API to include last 10 execution summaries for a pipeline (#2840) * Scan directly into types.ExecutionInfo * Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main' into dd/pipeline-execs * Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main' into dd/pipeline-execs * Add last_executions param and optimize db query for last execs * Enhance pipeline list API to include last 10 execution summaries for a pipeline

COMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: [CODE-2426]: Separate CODE Repo Create/Edit into distinct permissions (#2758)
